attributes.action: Withdraw the UK from the European Court of Human Rights.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is a sovereign nation and should be able to set and enact our own laws without inteference from a foreign court.
attributes.background: In light of the ECHR preventing the removal of illegal migrants from the UK to Rwanda, the Government must withdraw the UK from the ECHR in the immediate future.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618456
